name: FEDERATION OF MALTESE AQUACULTURE PRODUCERS
goal:
Representing the Members of the FMAP both in Malta and abroad on matters of common interest;
Developing knowledge and science in connection with Aquaculture
Promotion of the Industry;
Technical and other assistance to the Members.
interests: Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
Blue Growth,
Aquacculture,
Blue Biotechnology
Sustainable Blue Economy Finance Principles
International Ocean Governance
ICCAT;
Common Fisheries policy;
